verses.verse: David made<WH6213> him houses<WH1004> in the city<WH5892> of David;<WH1732> and he prepared<WH3559> a place<WH4725> for the ark<WH727> of God,<WH430> and pitched<WH5186> for it a tent.<WH168>

of the sons<WH1121> of Kohath,<WH6955> Uriel<WH222> the chief,<WH8269> and his brothers<WH251> one hundred<WH3967> twenty;<WH6242>
of the sons<WH1121> of Merari,<WH4847> Asaiah<WH6222> the chief,<WH8269> and his brothers<WH251> two hundred<WH3967> twenty;<WH6242>
of the sons<WH1121> of Gershom,<WH1647> Joel<WH3100> the chief,<WH8269> and his brothers<WH251> one hundred<WH3967> thirty;<WH7970>
of the sons<WH1121> of Elizaphan,<WH469> Shemaiah<WH8098> the chief,<WH8269> and his brothers<WH251> two hundred;<WH3967>

and said<WH559> to them,<WH7218> "You are the heads of the fathers<WH1>' households of the Levites.<WH3881> Sanctify<WH6942> yourselves,<WH251> both you and your brothers, that you may bring up<WH5927> the ark<WH727> of Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> to the place that I have prepared for it.<WH3559>
For because you didn't<WH7223> carry it at first, Yahweh<WH3068> our God<WH430> made broke<WH6555> out against us,<WH1875> because we didn't seek him according to the ordinance.<WH4941>"
So the priests<WH3548> and the Levites<WH3881> sanctified<WH6942> themselves to bring up<WH5927> the ark<WH727> of Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478>

The children<WH1121> of the Levites<WH3881> bore<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of God<WH430> on their shoulders<WH3802> with the poles<WH4133> thereon,<WH4872> as Moses commanded<WH6680> according to the word<WH1697> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

David<WH1732> spoke<WH559> to the chief<WH8269> of the Levites<WH3881> to appoint<WH5975> their brothers<WH251> the singers,<WH7891> with instruments<WH3627> of music,<WH7892> stringed instruments<WH3627> and harps<WH3658> and cymbals,<WH4700> sounding<WH8085> aloud and lifting up<WH7311> the voice<WH6963> with joy.<WH8057>

So David,<WH1732> and the elders<WH2205> of Israel,<WH3478> and the captains<WH8269> over thousands,<WH505> went<WH1980> to bring up<WH5927> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> out of the house<WH1004> of Obed-Edom<WH5654> with joy.<WH8057>

David<WH1732> was clothed<WH3736> with a robe<WH4598> of fine linen,<WH948> and all the Levites<WH3881> who bore<WH5375> the ark,<WH727> and the singers,<WH7891> and Chenaniah<WH3663> the master<WH8269> of the song<WH4853> with the singers:<WH7891> and David<WH1732> had on him an ephod<WH646> of linen.<WH906>

Thus all Israel<WH3478> brought up<WH5927> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> with shouting,<WH8643> and with sound<WH6963> of the cornet,<WH7782> and with trumpets,<WH2689> and with cymbals,<WH4700> sounding aloud<WH8085> with stringed instruments<WH5035> and harps.<WH3658>

It happened,<WH727> as the ark of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> came<WH935> to the city<WH5892> of David,<WH1732> that Michal<WH4324> the daughter<WH1323> of Saul<WH7586> looked out<WH8259> at the window,<WH2474> and saw<WH7200> king<WH4428> David<WH1732> dancing<WH7540> and playing;<WH7832> and she despised<WH959> him in her heart.<WH3820>
